gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
DOC/NOAA/NWS/NDBC > National Data Buoy Center, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
DOC/NOAA/NWS/NDBC > National Data Buoy Center, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NDBC Home Page with links to current station data.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The Active Marine Station Metadata is a daily metadata report for active marine bouy and C-MAN (Coastal Marine Automated Network) platforms from the National Data Buoy Center (NDBC). Metadata includes the station id, latitude/longitude (resolution to thousandths of a degree), the station name, the station owner, the program the station is associated with (e.g., TAO, NDBC, tsunami, NOS, etc.), station type (e.g., buoy, fixed, oil rig, etc.), notification if the station observes meteorology, currents, and water quality (signified by 'y' for yes and 'n' for no). If there is a 'y' associated with one of these tags, then the station has reported data in that category within the last 8 hours (or 24 hours for DART stations--Deep-Ocean Assessment Reporting of Tsunamis). If there is an 'n', data has not been received within those times. Stations are removed from the list when they are dismantled. The metadata information is written to a daily XML-formatted file.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: NCDC uses this station information as the official list for populating C-MAN locations (capturing the latitude and longitude data) which are not transmitted with the original observations through the Global Telecommunications System (GTS). This metadata supplements existing ICOADS/GTS archived datasets and will also support ICOADS data processing at NCDC.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Distribution liability: NOAA and NCEI make no warranty, expressed or implied, regarding these data, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NOAA and NCEI cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in these data. If appropriate, NCEI can only certify that the data it distributes are an authentic copy of the records that were accepted for inclusion in the NCEI archives.

Use liability: NOAA and NCEI cannot provide any warranty as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of furnished data. Users assume responsibility to determine the usability of these data. The user is responsible for the results of any application of this data for other than its intended purpose.

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: Elevation, when present, of station in meters above mean sea level

gmi:rangeElement.gco:Record: WMO assigned 5-character alpha-numeric station identifier: UN/WMO > World Meteorological Organization, United Nations
5 character alphanumeric code assigned to C-Man sites: DOC/NOAA/NWS/NDBC > National Data Buoy Center, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
NDBC Marine Station Names: DOC/NOAA/NWS/NDBC > National Data Buoy Center, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
NDBC list of station owners: DOC/NOAA/NWS/NDBC > National Data Buoy Center, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmi:definition.gco:CharacterString: Program with which the station is associated

gmi:rangeElement.gco:Record: NDBC list of programs associated with marine stations: DOC/NOAA/NWS/NDBC > National Data Buoy Center, National Weather Service, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
buoy: Drifting or moored bouy platforms
dart: Deep-ocean Assessment and Reporting of Tsunamis
fixed: stationary buoy or fixed reporting site
oilrig: station located on oil rig
y: Station has reported meteoroglogical observations within the last 8 hours.
n: Station has not reported meteoroglogical observations within the last 8 hours but is still considered active.
y: Station has reported Currents observations within the last 8 hours.
n: Station has not reported Currents observations within the last 8 hours, but is still considered active.
y: Station has reported Water Quality observations within the last 8 hours.
n: Station has not reported Water Quality observations within the last 8 hours, but is still considered active.
y: Station has reported DART observations within the last 24 hours.
n: Station has not reported DART observations within the last 24 hours but is still considered active.

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Bulk metadata change applied on 2018-05-25. See version control repository history for metadata change details.
